page.title: 16Our House.
page.content: Our house is a semi-detatched. We have 8 rooms; 3 bedrooms,dining room, living room, bathroom, toilet and kitchen. We have a garden at the front and back. We have a greenhouse at the bottom of the garden with tomatoes in it. We have got a coal house as well. We heat our water with a coal fire. We have got 2 gas fires which take cylinders. We have got a gas cooker and a washing machine. We have got a boiler which our dog sleeps underneath. We have got a little room under the stairs and there's a place where we pay for the gas. Our house is made out of breeze blocks. The downstairs floor is concrete and the upstairs floor is made of wood. Nearby the houses are similar but some are built of brick. All the houses in our street belong to the council.
